thread.title: BRIEF-MTU Aero CEO expects more clarity on possible Boeing middle of market plane this year

title: BRIEF-MTU Aero CEO expects more clarity on possible Boeing middle of market plane this year
text: February 21, 2018 / 9:06 AM / in 15 minutes BRIEF-MTU Aero CEO expects more clarity on possible Boeing middle of market plane this year Reuters Staff Feb 21 (Reuters) - Mtu Aero Engines management during a press conference: * CFO SAYS TOO EARLY TO SAY HOW FIX FOR A320NEO ENGINE WILL LOOK, TALKS ONGOING * CFO SAYS COSTS FOR DEALING WITH A320NEO PROBLEMS INCLUDED IN 2018 OUTLOOK * CEO SAYS PRIORITY IS ORGANIC GROWTH, COULD IMAGINE SHARE BUYBACKS IN YEARS WITH HIGH CASH FLOW * CEO SAYS BELIEVES WILL HAVE MORE CLARITY ON POSSIBLE BOEING MIDDLE OF MARKET PLANE THIS YEAR Further company coverage:
